          <title>
            <string language="sl">Izračun srednje vrednosti</string>
            <string language="en">Calculating arithmetic mean</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Arithmetisches Rechenmittel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Moyenne arithmétique calculatrice</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Meio aritmético calculador</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Media aritmetica calcolatrice</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υπολογισμός του αριθμητικού μέσου όρου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Medio aritmético calculador</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Delovni list za pridobivanje znanja o izračunu srednje vrednosti. Za osnovno šolo z nižjim izobrazbenim standardom.</string>
            <string language="en">Simple exercise that collects all data and then calculates arithmetic mean.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">srednja vrednost</string>
            <string language="en">arithmetic mean</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">matematika</string>

          </keyword>

            <string language="en">statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">povprečje</string>

          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einfache Übung, die alle Daten und dann sammelt, 
arithmetisches Mittel errechnet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'exercice simple qui rassemble toutes les 
données et puis calcule la moyenne arithmétique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O exercício simples que coleta todos os dados e 
então calcula o meio aritmético.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'esercitazione semplice che raccoglie tutti i 
dati ed allora calcola la media aritmetica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απλή άσκηση που συλλέγει όλα τα στοιχεία και 
υπολογίζει έπειτα τον αριθμητικό μέσο όρο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El ejercicio simple que recoge todos los datos y 
entonces calcula medio aritmético.</string>
          </description>
